committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President of the United States to issue a proclamation on Independence Day, July 4, of each year calling upon Government officials and the people of the United States to display the flag of the United States and to participate in appropriate ceremonies in recognition of their liberty and independence.

summary.text: Requests the President to issue a proclamation on Independence Day, July 4, of each year calling upon Government officials and the people of the United States to display the U.S. flag and to participate in ceremonies in recognition of their independence.

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President of the United States to issue a proclamation on Independence Day, July 4, of each year calling upon Government officials and the people of the United States to display the flag of the United States and to participate in appropriate ceremonies in recognition of their liberty and independence.
